subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In New England’s 24-21 victory over the Chargers, the 24-year-old Philip Rivers proved a fast study and an able leader in directing San Diego to within whiskers of the A.F.C. championship game.
snippet: In New England’s 24-21 victory over the Chargers, the 24-year-old Philip Rivers proved a fast study and an able leader in directing San Diego to within whiskers of the A.F.C. championship game.
